wiki » AI

AI

A wiki page all about artificial intelligence (or AI).

Artificial intelligence, or AI, is an umbrella term describing how machines learn and process data.

From self-driving cars to personal assistants and chatbots, AI continues to grow in popularity and notoriety. The articles and notes on this page offer a balanced approach to this technology, showing both the capabilities and harms involved.

Related terms: machine learning | natural language processing | computer vision | speech recognition
